thread.title: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'
thread.title_full: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'

title: Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live'
text: > Entertainment Hispanic coalition: Take Trump off 'Saturday Night Live' FILE - This Feb. 19, 2013 file photo shows producer Lorne Michaels of "Saturday Night Live" attending the 15th Annual Costume Designers Guild Awards at The Beverly Hilton Hotel in Beverly Hills. A Hispanic coalition is condemning NBC's "Saturday Night Live" for inviting Donald Trump to host the show. In a letter sent Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015, to the show's producer, Michaels, and the CEO of NBC Universal, Stephen Burke, the National Hispanic Leadership Agenda said the network was enabling Trump's "hateful speech" in exchange for ratings. (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File)
